comment.body:
> Is this an app or a website? Please send more information and also steps for reproduction.

我不確定要說中文還是機翻成英文，所以請讓我先用中文
目前我已試過的規則如下：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$script
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$object
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##script
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##object
但是並沒有作用，而其他的如：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$third-party
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$other
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$～object
則是不能連上網頁？，上面圖1的部分會出現錯誤

關於app的補充，與#21078是相同的
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21078#issuecomment-412828928

但是可以阻擋廣告，卻不能阻擋上面圖2的內容

comment.body:
Nie jestem pewny, czy ten element powinien być traktowany jako reklama.
Po jego kliknięciu strona przekierowuje do `https://www.benchmark.pl/back-to-school-2022.html` gdzie jest dostępny "konkurs z nagrodami".

Dodaj proszę tę regułę:
```
||benchmark.pl/uploads/backend_img/c/ikonki/2022/BTS/*x*.jpg
```
do reguł użytkownika.

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body: @Alex-302 а что насчёт https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/121586#issuecomment-1213229142?

issue.title: Disabling overwriting clipboard
issue.body:
More details here: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1334203
Test page: https://output.jsbin.com/yuliwoz/quiet

Feature can be used to put advertising in clipboard.

comment.body:
I suppose that it also can be used to useful things (like, for example, button to copy image/text to clipboard, or something similar), maybe it would be better to add it to `Tracking Protection` filter, though I'm still not sure.
By the way, it seems that there is also `navigator.clipboard.writeText` which can also be abused.

issue.title: www.hofer.at

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hofer.at/de/filialen.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hofer.at%2Fde%2Ffilialen.html) ### Comment Username: @stefanct > The filter stops the consent popup to be shown (that informs about data sent to a 3rd party - in this case google), cf. 1.png. > If the filter is disabled and consent is given, the google map is embedded and one can use the search field (cf. 2.png). Since the consent is saved in a cookie, the search field continues to work with the filter enabled but that's just a workaround - the consent popup should never be blocked IMHO. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/VgV8Rfv.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/5wtwgYU.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard Annoyances in uBlock Origins Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

I had the same problem. I found a solution.
Disable "**Hide Referrer from third parties**" in settings
